featured.text: His 1848 novel, The Man in the Iron Mask, was recently made into a movie.

definition.zh_def: 遮蓋面部的物品，通常用於保護或隱藏身份。
definition.en_def: An item worn to cover the face, often used for protection or to conceal identity.
definition.example: She wore a mask to protect herself from the dust.
